item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ChIPseeker and your publication will be featured here. 2017 Promoter-bound METTL3 maintains myeloid leukaemia by m6A-dependent translation control. Nature. 2017. Regeneration of the entire human epidermis using transgenic stem cells. Nature. 2017. Global DNA methylation analysis reveals miR-214-3p contributes to cisplatin resistance in pediatric intracranial nongerminomatous malignant germ cell tumors. Neuro-Oncology. 2017. Identification of the direct regulon of NtcA during early acclimation to nitrogen starvation in the cyanobacterium Synechocystis sp.
